function.description: Loads the web page and returns it as a page object. The Web.loadPage() function can also be used for local HTML files. Usually it is a good idea to reduce loading time by setting up the options to ({"loadimages"=false, "enablejs"=false}) when calling Web.loadPage(). This deactivates JavaScript and loading the images and it can reduce long waits for script timeouts.
